Header.title: American Airlines Co-Pilot
Header.paragraph: AI assistant, Itenerary planner, Flight tracker.

About.paragraph: American Airlines Co-Pilot was made by users for users and consumers of American Airlines app, it seeks to bring more quality of life features to the app and strengthen brand loyalty through them.
Why2: Built by users for users, ensuring features are practical and enhance your travel experience.
Provides seamless tools to simplify planning, tracking, and managing your journeys.
Designed to deepen customer satisfaction and loyalty with American Airlines.
Features a smart chatbot ready to help you with saved flights and itineraries.

Features.title: A realtime flight tracker
Features.text: So you never miss a flight.

Features.title: Efficent Design
Features.text: So you can get back to vacationing.
